short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-clears cache, history, and download list on a startup. Manual cleanup available. Keeps cookies and settings intact.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clears your browser's cache, history, and download list on startup. Also provides an option for manual cleanup. Keeps your browsing experience clean without removing cookies or altering website settings.
